trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around March 19th 2002
divs: Sighting Details I was driving east at night when I saw twostationary pulsating red lights above a field to the north. They resembled towerbeacons but I thought there were no towers in that vicinity so I stopped to lookat it. I then noticed a bright star-like white light that was ascending towardsthe red lights. When it reached the red lights the white light disappeared.About twenty seconds later the red lights started to move in a NNW direction. Iwatched as they slowly faded into the distance. It was overcast that night, Icould discern any structure, however the two red lights maintained theredistance from each other and remained paralell to the ground throuout the event.No sounds detected. If feel I witnessed something highly unusual as I have noexplanation for it.Benjamin Hart
Summary: two stationary red lights and one moving white lig
